document_data.mainbody:
Etsu-no-kami Makoto was a spirit folk samurai adventurer in Miyama Province in Kozakura in 1357 DR.
Makoto was born in Miyama to the samurai Etsu-no-kami Yasutoki and the spirit lady of a great willow. Yasutoki held a small shoen until a plot in the provincial capital of Tamanokuni forced the shugo-daimyo to banish all the family and Yasutokis position went to Inoue Kanemori of the Inoue clan.
In 1357 DR, Yasutoki died and Makoto with his friend Saisho went back to Miyama in search of adventure.
